After Sales+Insurance Services+Claims Ma.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to process insurance claims from initial submission to final resolution, reflecting efficiency in claims management.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Claims Ma.FORMULA: Average Time Taken to Process Claims

After Sales+Insurance Services+Claims Ma.EXPLANATION: Percentage of claims settled compared to the total number of claims filed, indicating the effectiveness of the claims resolution process.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Claims Ma.FORMULA: (Number of Claims Settled / Total Number of Claims) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services+Claims Ma.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with the claims management process, including handling, resolution, and communication, gathered through surveys and feedback.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Claims Ma.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Score for Claims Management

After Sales+Insurance Services+Claims Ma.EXPLANATION: Percentage of claims processed correctly without errors, reflecting the precision of the claims handling process.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Claims Ma.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Claims / Total Number of Claims) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services+Claims Ma.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred to process each insurance claim, including administrative and operational expenses.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Claims Ma.FORMULA: Total Cost of Processing Claims / Total Number of Claims Processed

After Sales+Insurance Services+Claims Ma.EXPLANATION: Percentage of insurance claims denied compared to the total number of claims submitted, reflecting the stringency of the claims approval process.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Claims Ma.FORMULA: (Number of Denied Claims / Total Number of Claims) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services+Claims Ma.EXPLANATION: Rate at which fraudulent claims are detected compared to the total number of claims processed, indicating the effectiveness of fraud prevention measures.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Claims Ma.FORMULA: (Number of Fraudulent Claims Detected / Total Number of Claims) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services+Claims Ma.KPIS: Claims management compliance with legal requirements.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Claims Ma.EXPLANATION: Degree to which the claims management process complies with legal requirements, measured through audits and regulatory reviews.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Claims Ma.FORMULA: (Number of Compliant Claims / Total Number of Claims) * 100
